sourcesContent: import moment from 'jalali-moment' const TableItem = ({id, user }) => { const removeItem = (e) => { user } return ( {user.userName} {user.email} {user.tel} {user.membership} {moment(new Date(user.date), "YYYY/MM/DD") .locale("fa") .format("YYYY/MM/DD")} ); } export default TableItem
